Text: GCS Reservation charge Change SoCalGasCan you comment on the Reservation charge change that happened Thanks Denise Forwarded by Denise WilderSFOEES on PM Enron Energy Services From Denise Wilder PM To Roger O ES Adam ES Zarin ES cc Subject GCS Reservation charge Change SoCalGas I have noticed we have not been beating the SoCalGas price As I investigated this further it appears the SoCalGas Reservation Charge was changed as of Did you notice this I dont think I saw the changes reflected on the most recent Savings Analysis spreadsheet I have attached the Commercial Industrial Rate Schedules Summary Can you please give some feedback I want to know how this should be figured The last rate was based upon Novembers usage divided by of days Thanks Denise
